definition: role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: He angled the camera in the correct postion.
sentences.chinese: 他把照相机调到了适当的角度。

sentences.english: This paper explored the determinants of the port collusion by constructing two game models.
sentences.chinese: 从博奕分析角度对港口合作条件进行了研究。

sentences.english: The author firstly reviews the historical evolution of WTO secretariat.
sentences.chinese: 笔者首先从历史的角度对秘书处做出了追根溯源。

sentences.english: A dog with the correct proportions and angulation can thereby achieve static balance.
sentences.chinese: 拥有的正确比例和角度，从而达到犬只的静态平衡。

sentences.english: This passage is to discuss the lexical characteristics of Business English.
sentences.chinese: 笔者将从词汇角度，略谈一下商务英语的用词特点。

sentences.english: For hydrophilic materials, the contact angle will be lower than 90 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 亲水性材料的接触角度会低于90度。

sentences.english: So the organism only wishes to die on its own terms.
sentences.chinese: 所以说生物想要死亡只是从他们自己的角度来看的。

sentences.english: Be open to new ideas, new ways of seeing things and new styles.
sentences.chinese: 要开放地接纳新观点，看事物的新角度，新风格。

sentences.english: Carnap tried to define causality from the angle of semantics.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔纳普试图从语义学角度来定义因果必然性。

sentences.english: He says progress towardld the eight goals should be judged nation-by-nation.
sentences.chinese: 他说这八个目标的进程应从各国的角度来裁定。

sentences.english: The etymological meaning of both words is “something added on.”
sentences.chinese: 从词源学的角度来看，两个词都有“附加物”的意思。

sentences.english: Why to examine the difference between literary language to the difference from the genre?
sentences.chinese: 为什么从体裁差别的角度去探讨文学语言的区别。

sentences.english: The lubricative path is a slightness hole which is oblique to the crank.
sentences.chinese: 此油道属细长孔，且于轴线成一定的角度。

sentences.english: The domain level focuses strictly on business interactions viewed from the perspective of the external actor.
sentences.chinese: 域层次严格集中在从外部演员的角度看到的业务交互。

sentences.english: And if I go look at the polar form of this, OK, good, looks right, right?
sentences.chinese: 现在它有一个不同的坐标，以及跟原来相同的角度？

sentences.english: Certainly from a carbon footprint standpoint.
sentences.chinese: 从碳足迹的角度来看，扎啤当然是最环保的。

definition: aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
to come and see/to see a topic from a certain point of view
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to set off/to start (on a journey)
